alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:22AM CDT until June 14 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHICKASAW AND SOUTHERN CALHOUN COUNTIES... At 1122 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Slate Springs, or 16 miles northwest of Eupora, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Calhoun City, Derma, Slate Springs, Sabougla, Big Creek, Woodland, Sparta, Tabbville, Anchor, Atlanta, Retreat, Dentontown and Slate Spring. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
